frame.name: High-Impact Frame
frame.description: Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

perks.description:
Omolon post sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Candle PS

perks.description:
Speeds up charge.
  •  Faster charge time
  •  Decreases impact damage
perks.name: Accelerated Coils

perks.description: Improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.
perks.name: Under Pressure
